verses.name: Job 27:18
verses.text: He buildeth his house as a moth, and as a booth that the keeper maketh.

verses.name: Job 27:19
verses.text: The rich man shall lie down, but he shall not be gathered: he openeth his eyes, and he is not.

verses.name: Job 27:20
verses.text: Terrors take hold on him as waters, a tempest stealeth him away in the night.

verses.name: Job 27:21
verses.text: The east wind carrieth him away, and he departeth: and as a storm hurleth him out of his place.

verses.name: Job 27:22
verses.text: For God shall cast upon him, and not spare: he would fain flee out of his hand.
